name: Hypatia Solutions
slogan: Cracking COVID-19 with Telemedicine and Quantum AI

jobs.title: React Native Intern  (Fighting COVID-19 - Urgent Project)
jobs.description: Looking for a work at home intern for an exciting, high impact COVID-19 based medical telemedicine software project initially being trialed from 6th April for 2 weeks but possibly subject to extension through the crisis. Must be self starting, flexible, availble through most of the day and willing to work on an Agile (SCRUM/DSDM) team over teleconferencing.
